Subject: Flirting for Geeks
Description: Come learn how to (and how not to) flirt from some of our local fandom's biggest flirts.  Not only is it laugh-out-loud funny, it's an irreverent and honest reflection of love, sex, and fandom. Find ways to woo, methods for making friends, and how to avoid being that creepy guy that we all talk about between conventions.  Speakers include:Greg Williams, Dawn Kuczwara, Nuri Gocay, Bob Waltenspiel, Dave Phillips - Track: After Dark  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Cooking With the Con Chair: Sushi!
Description: Our illustrious Con Char and indefatigable Head of Programming take an hour out from their real passions (Con - duh!) to share one of their other passions - sushi!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Nuri Gocay - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: DIY Infusions and Liqueurs
Description: Come see techniques for making homemade infusions and liqueurs! Techniques involving fruit, herbs and spices, alcohol bases, and sweeteners will be included. Must be 21+ to participate.  Speakers include:Heather Fish, Nuri Gocay - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: So You Want to be a Manager
Description: Ah, the glamorous life of a manager! Or is it? Come hear a few voices 'from the trenches' talk about what it's really like to lead a team, what the job actually entails and some of the horrible - and horribly funny - stories of uncomfortable and embarrassing tasks we as managers have had to complete.  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay, Jer Lance, Dawn Kuczwara, Dave Phillips - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: 2014's Con Chair Roast
Description: Our fearless leader has finally found something to fear - a roasting by his friends and underlings! It's probably all in good fun, but don't expect everyone to be sober.  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay, Misha Tuesday, Dawn Kuczwara, James Gamble, Britain Woodman - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Closing Ceremonies
Description:
As we officially shut down another amazing, exciting year for Penguicon, come hear about how it went, and what we've got our eye on for next year.  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, 
Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Jen Owen - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Sound System

Subject: Creating Safe Spaces
Description: How can we create safe spaces for people of all varieties at the convention, and in our lives outside of fandom? Join a discussion with our staff (including the con chair) and those who have ideas on how we can do better on inclusivity and promoting consent.  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay, April Nance, Scott Kennedy, Mark Oshiro, Mari Brighe - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Opening Ceremonies
Description:
Join our con chair, Nuri Gocay, the Con Committee, and our Guests of Honor as we open this bad boy up for the weekend.  You never know what surprises might be in store!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, 
Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Jen Owen - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Sound System

Subject: Penguicon 2016 Planning Meeting
Description: Making a successful Penguicon requires at least a year of organizing, planning, and partying.  Do not skip the partying!  Join us for the first planning meeting with the 2016 ConChair, Scott Kennedy, and his selected Con Committee. If you you want to contribute to Penguicon next year, or you just want to see how we make it happen, join us!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: So This is Your First Penguicon?
Description: Our chair, Nuri, will talk about how he first joined Penguicon, and give you a tour of what's awesome (everything!) here.  If you're new to Penguicon and you want to get to know the event, this is the panel for you!  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
